page.title: 16The Relief road.
page.content: In 1955 there was adecisoin to build arelief road.The road is being built because there are too many vehicles on the main street.They had to knock down the tenth row and the inhabitants went to live elsewhere. The relief road starts beside Presto and joins the spine road that leads to Newcastle.It will cost 2,750,000 pounds to build.Wansbeck are not doing the job because they only do small jobs.Northumberland county council deal with larger jobs. George's grandma is not keen on having a new road.She says it will be harder for old people to get to the shops.Others say it will be easier.
